column2: "Na Israelmba too mbra wɔ adze a woetu esi hɔ ama ɔsɛɛ no no ho: osiandɛ Akan a ofi Juda ebusuakuw mu a ɔyɛ Karmi (Karmi) a n'egya nye Zabdi a ɔno so n'egya nye Zera no
column3: ne babanyin no faa adze a wɔadom no no bi: na EWURADZE n'ebufuw dzɛɛw wɔ Israelmba no do."

column2: "Na Josua somaa mbarimba ma wofi Jeriko kɔr Ai a ɔwɔ Bɛt-aven nkyɛn wɔ Bɛtɛl no boka afamu
column3: na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom mfow nkɔ nkɛsera asaase no. Na mbarimba no fowee kɔree kɛseraa Ai."

column2: "Na wɔsanee baa Josua hɔ bɛsee no dɛ
column3: Mma mma ɔman no nyinara mmfow nnkɔ; mbom ma mbarimba bɛyɛ mpemebien anaa mpemebiasa mfow nkɔ nkɔbɔ Ai; mma mma ɔman no nyinara mmfona hɔnho nnkefir hɔ: osiandɛ hɔn ho suar."

column2: "Nna ɔman no mu mbarimba bɛyɛ mpemebiasa fowee kɔr hɔ: na woguanee wɔ Ai mbarimba no enyim."
"Na Ai mbarimba no kunkum hɔn mu mbarimba bɛyɛ eduasa esia: na wotsiiw hɔn dze fi kuropon no ano araa kodur Sebarim
column3: na wokunkum hɔn wɔ nsianee no mu: na ɔman no hɔn akoma tutui

column2: "Na Josua sunsuaan ne ntar mu
column3: na ɔdze n'enyim butuuw famu wɔ EWURADZE n'adakaa no enyim araa ma okodur ewimbir
column4: ɔnoara na Israel mpanyimfo no; na wotuu huntuma guguu hɔn etsifi."

column2: "Na Josua see dɛ
column3: Afei
column5: ɔyɛ dɛn ara ntsi na edze ɔman yi etwa Jordan
column6: dɛ edze hɛn rebɛhyɛ Amorifo nsa
column7: ma wɔaama yɛahyew yi? Yehunii a nkyɛ yɛnyɛ foo ntsena Jordan egya noho!"

column2: "Ao EWURADZE
column3: na menka dɛn
column4: Israel na wɔadan hɔn ekyir ama hɔn atamfo yi!"

column2: "Na Keenanfo nye asaase no do atsefo no nyinara bɛtse nka
column3: na woetwa hɛn ho ehyia
column4: na woetwa hɛn dzin efi asaase do: na ebɛyɛ dɛn ama wo dzin kɛse no?"

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Josua dɛ
column3: Soɛr: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na edze w'enyim ebutuw famu dɛm yi?"

column2: "Israel ayɛ bɔn; nyew
column3: wɔato m'ahyɛmu a mehyɛɛ hɔn ho mbra no mpo: nyew
column4: wɔafa adze a wɔadom no no so mpo bi; na woewia adze so
column6: na wɔdze akɛhyɛ hɔnankasa hɔn adze so mpo mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na Israelmba no nntum nngyina hɔn atamfo enyim no
column3: dan ara na wɔbɛdan hɔn ekyir ama hɔn atamfo
column4: osiandɛ wɔabɛyɛ ebusufo: minnkedzi hom ekyir bio
column5: gyedɛ hom sɛɛ adze a wɔadom no no fi hom mu."

column2: "Soɛr
column3: tsew ɔman no ho
column5: Hom ntsew homho nsie ɔkyena: na mbrɛ EWURADZE
column8: Adze a wɔadom no no bi wɔ wo mu
column10: gyedɛ hom eyi adze a wɔadom no no efi hom mu ana."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi anapa hom mfa no hom ebusuakuw mu ebusuakuw mu ntwe mpin: na ɔmbra dɛ
column3: ebusuakuw a EWURADZE beyi no ntwe mpin ebusua mu ebusua mu; na ebusua a EWURADZE beyi no ntwe mpin no efibobow mu efibobow mu; na ofibobow a EWURADZE beyi no ntwe mpin no nyimpa nkorkor mu."

column2: "Na ɔmbra dɛ
column3: nyia adze a wɔadom no no besi no no wɔdze gya bɛhyew no
column4: ɔnoara nye dza ɔwɔ nyinara: osiandɛ ɔato EWURADZE n'ahyɛmu no

column2: "Nna Josua soɛɛr anapaatu
column3: na ɔdze Israel twee pinii wɔ ebusuakuw mu ebusuakuw mu; na woyii Juda ebusuakuw no:"

column2: "na ɔdze Juda ebusua no twee pinii; na oyii Zerafo ebusua no: na ɔdze Zerafo ebusua no twee pinii wɔ nyimpa nkorkor mu; na woyii Zabdi:"
"na ɔdze ne fibobow twee pinii wɔ nyimpa nkorkor mu: na woyii Akan (Akan)
column3: Karmi ne babanyin na Zabdi ne nana no."

column2: "Na Josua see Akan (Akan) dɛ
column3: Me babanyin
column7: na yi no ayɛw; na afei ka dza ayɛ kyerɛ me; mma nnsiw me do."

column2: "Na Akan buaa Josua see dɛ
column3: Nokwar mayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE

column2: "aber a muhun asadze no mu Babilɔn egugudo fɛɛfɛw bi
column3: nye dwetɛ dwetɛbona ahaenu
column4: nye sika ndamba a ɔtow dwetɛbona eduonum no
column7: ɔhyɛ famu wɔ m'asesee no mu

column2: "Nna Josua somaa abɔfo
column3: na wɔdze mbirika kɔr asese no mu; na

column2: "Na woyii no wɔ asese no mu
column3: na wɔdze brɛɛ Josua
column4: nye Israelmba no nyinara; na wɔdze boguu EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na Josua nye Israel nyinara faa Akan (Achan)
column3: Zera ne babanyin no
column12: nye dza ɔwɔ nyinara: na wɔdze hɔn baa Akɔr (Akor) ɔbɔn mu."

column2: "Na Josua see no dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na afona hɛn yi? EWURADZE bɔfona wo ndɛ da yi. Na Israel nyinara siiw no abo; na wɔdze abo siiw hɔn na wɔdze ogya hyeew hɔn."

column2: "Na wɔhɔɔr no do abosiw kɛsenara dze bodu ndɛ da yi: na EWURADZE danee fii n'ebufuw ne hyeehyew no ho. Dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ bea no ne dzin
column3: Akɔr (Akor) ɔbɔn
